name: teacher
desc: You see a nervous person, with shifting eyes, and fidgeting fingers working at a computer.
long: Oh. You startled me. I was about to put in Lab Grades but was watching a video ... to help a friend. Please run along, you should be home eating supper.
short: Please run along. I am about to put in Lab Grades after watching this ... to help a friend.
hint: I seem to have lost my SD Card.
